rules.Momentary Oath: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a +Star Marines+ model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

rules.Dark Pacts:
Each time a +Star Traitors+ unit is selected to shoot or fight, it can make a Dark Pact. If it does, select one of the following abilities for that unit’s weapons to gain until the end of the phase:
* +[LETHAL HITS]+
* +[SUSTAINED HITS 1]+

Each time a unit makes a Dark Pact, after it has resolved its attacks, it must take a leadership test; if that test is failed, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
